mapper.select: select baby_id babyId, child_birth childBirth, prefer from baby where iuser=#{iuser} order by updated_at DESC limit 3
SELECT C.allergy_id allergyId,C.allergy_name allergyName from baby A inner join baby_table B ON A.baby_id=B.baby_id INNER JOIN allergy C ON B.allergy_id=C.allergy_id WHERE A.baby_id=#{babyId};
